Do what you want

HOW TO?

‚Äî Download the .js-file and include it in your site
‚Äî Look down under what you want, and what HTML class to init with.

The library doesn't include visable styling, so style your elements however you like.

Should work for all kinds of elements, as long as you put the right class on it.

No dependencies.

INCLUDING:

Magnetized elements:

When the cursor is close. The element is drawn to it.

<button class="annouing magnet">Sign up</button>

Fading elements:

When the cursor is closing in. The element fades out.

<a href="#" class="annouing fade">Cancel subscription</a>
Cancel subscription

Growing elements:

When the element is in viewport. The element grows. Otherwise, goes back to normal.

<button class="annouing grow">BUY NOW</button>

Non closing elements:

When the cursor is close, the element moves away. Put the sensible element inside a container. The element will be put in the top corner and the container will be what moves around.

<div> (this will move)
  <button class="annouing avoid">
    ❌
  <button>
  [POPUP CONTENT]
</div>

üì¨

Sign up for a newsletter

We will send one very often

‚úâÔ∏è

A fly on the screen:

For touch screens. Changes direction when it appears in the viewport. Walks around inside the element that has the class

<div class="annouing fly"> (will walk around in here)
  <a href="#">Go check out this thing on this website!</a>
</div>

Go check out this thing on this website!

Text changes:

The text in the element gradually changes as the cursor comes near. Put the text you want to swap to in the data-swap attribute

<button class="annouing swap" data-swap="Submit">
  Cancel
</button>

Nested dropdowns: ( in progress )

Thanks. But no thanks.
